com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom
Interface Vertex

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleVertex, VertexBufferArray.BufferedVertex
public interface Vertex

Interface that must be implemented by objects that represent vertices.

Version:

martin
